text: Balkampet Yellamma temple is a Hindu goddess temple located at Balkampet in Hyderabad. Yearly in ashadamasam kalayanavostam is done. It is very famous among Bonaalu and on Sundays. ==Location== This temple is located at Balkampet in Hyderabad. ==References== Category:Hindu temples in Hyderabad, India
title: Balkampet Yellamma temple
